Content:: Miu Chu (Chinese: 朱俐靜; Wade–Giles: Chu1 Li4-ching4; 16 December 1981 – 3 July 2022) was a Taiwanese singer. She was the winner of the third season of the Taiwanese reality television show Super Idol.[1] Chu performed at the Kaohsiung lantern festival in a concert on 12 February 2011. She has also performed at Legacy Taipei.[2][3] On 5 January 2021, while promoting her final full-length album released in late December 2020, Chu announced she was battling breast cancer.[4] Her family confirmed via Facebook on 3 July 2022 that Chu died at the age of 40 after a two-year battle with the disease.[5][6][7]
